p: E. sibthorpiana is found in the North: Qazvin, Akbarabad, Gilan: Rostam Abad near Rasht, West: Bisheh, Northeast: between Bojnoord and Maravetappe, Alborz area: between Tehran and Ab Ali, Evin, Roodehen, between Tehran and Jajrood, Pachenar near Qazvin, Manjil, Ali Abad near Karaj, Halgheh Heights near Mardabad-Karaj, Central District: Ghamsar Kashan.[ 16]
